item.description:
EVENT: A fun time for all, play a round of golf at McGolfâ€™s mingolf and get a chance to test your skills out with
some other Mosaic members at one of the best courses in the area. McGolf is also noted for having some
great ice cream that people can enjoy after playing a round or 2. Bring bug spray and rain cancels.


TC: Andrea anissenbaum@lycos.com or (617) 469-9599 until 9:00pm
MEET: Meet 4:30pm at McGolf Rte 109 Westwood in the parking lot near the entrance.
RSVP: Required by August 21st.
COST: $7.25 for golf, $5.00 for non-members plus the cost for any Ice cream or dinner after the game

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: MINATURE GOLF
